document.full_text: in the wiretaps that brought down raj rajaratnam, bankers and consultants used language that painted themselves as gladiators and their actions as smart and daring, not criminal.
document.title: currents: finding the words to forgive themselves
lines_and_colors: in the wiretaps that brought down raj rajaratnam, bankers and consultants used language that painted themselves as gladiators and their actions as smart and daring, not criminal.
